nodes.name: AccreditationRepo

nodes.documentation:
@notice AccreditationRepo constructor sets the admin
@param _admin Address of admin which can grant and revoke accreditation

nodes.name: grantAccreditation
revokeAccreditation
setAdmin
AccreditationRepo

nodes.documentation:
@notice AccreditationRepo constructor sets the admin
@param _admin Address of admin which can grant and revoke accreditation

nodes.name: grantAccreditation
revokeAccreditation
setAdmin

params._admin: Address of admin which can grant and revoke accreditation

grantAccreditation(address).details: Restricted to admin which can be an externally owned account or a contract enabling vote based administration

isOwner().return: true if `msg.sender` is the owner of the contract.

renounceOwnership().details: Allows the current owner to relinquish control of the contract. It will not be possible to call the functions with the `onlyOwner` modifier anymore.

revokeAccreditation(address).details: Restricted to admin which can be an externally owned account or a contract enabling vote based administration

params._newAdmin: address of new admin user or contract

transferOwnership(address).details: Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.

params.newOwner: The address to transfer ownership to.

grantAccreditation(address).notice: grantAccreditation adds an attester address to the whitelist

renounceOwnership().notice: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

revokeAccreditation(address).notice: revokeAttestation removes an attester address from the whitelist

setAdmin(address).notice: setAdmin changes the contract admin which has privileges to grant and revoke accreditation

userdoc.notice: Bloom stores a whitelist of accredited attesters. This list is queried during the whisper negotiation process to ensure trusted attesters are bidding on jobs. In future versions of this contract, accreditation will be sourced by the community
